property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: Determines where temporary MapReduce data is written. It also may be a list of directories.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: Determines where temporary MapReduce data is written. It also may be a list of directories.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: As a rule of thumb, use 10x the number of slaves (i.e., number of tasktrackers).

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: As a rule of thumb, use 2x the number of slave processors (i.e., number of tasktrackers).

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: Maximum numbers of mappers per task-trackers

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
property.description: Maximum number of reducers per task-tracker
